website_summaries.verdict: The true wireless JLab JBuds Air Sport earphones offer strong battery life, a waterproof design, and average audio quality for $69.
cons: Bass boosting destroys balance of some mixes

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had to change my opinion of these wirless earbuds, they are rubbish. i have had these since November 2019 and upto yesterday 26th March 2020, the left earbud has stopped working. I have tried resetting them which is recommended by Jlabs guide but still no good, i am losing my mind on these and every other mid range earbuds. DO NOT BUY THESE BECAUSE THE LEFT BUD WILL FAIL, CHECK THE REVIEWS OF COMPLAINTS. Do i really need to but a pair over 200 quid to be satisified?
customer_reviews.author: Charles Latty

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly for the record, I don't usually bother rating products. I haven't got time and can't be bothered. But I'm taking a couple of minutes to recommend these and save a few of you the expense of buying inferior wireless earphones. I wanted a pair of earphones for running and I had bought three different pairs that wouldn't stay in. I gave those away to family who will use them walking. After asking for friends recommendations on Facebook I hit on these. They sound great, the touch sensitive controls are easy, the charging case is sturdy and well made and most importantly they stay in my ears. I really excellent product. Well made, it speaks quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Hudson

customer_reviews.title: customer service???
customer_reviews.text: Right earbud didn't work on arrival and when I kept reconnecting it started to work but then the left one failed.... A work colleague recommended this brand to me but I found out the hard way that they are an inferior brand... I will be advising my colleague of my frustrating experience.... customer service through the brands website non responsive
customer_reviews.author: TBC

customer_reviews.title: Persistent charging issues
customer_reviews.text: 1 star. Persistent charge problems. Sometimes it will fully charge the buds, mostly it will only charge one of them. For some reason, as soon as the left ear bud gains any power, it tries to connect to the other one and stops charging. I have tried various solutions, from different online sources. I contacted the maker. No response. So, 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: DonkeyWan

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Headphones broke after 3 months. Right headphone would not charge. Therefore headphones are completely useless. Amazon try to get away with not providing refund or replacement after one month. For any UK customers be aware this is a breach of your statutory rights and they do have to replace or refund items that are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Jlab headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with jlabs. Would recommend to all. Only thing is battery life is not communicated on headphone like other makes. Bit of guesswork. But overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: paul loughlin

customer_reviews.title: Runners
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant- stay in yr ears great for runners - comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jacki Rumble

customer_reviews.title: JLab Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Very secure when running / working out. Sound quality and volume level disappointing to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: John Conway

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely rubbish!! Returned them to John Lewis!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these ONCE for a half hour run before the left earbud would no longer charge or connect to the right earbud! Very disappointing product! Thankfully I had bought these from John Lewis (customer service at its finest) and they allowed me to exchange them for a pair of Jaybird X4 earphones, which are excellent. Read the other reviews on here (or anything via Google) and you will find that the left earphone dying is a very common problem with seemingly many JLab products!! How can a company like JLab continue to ignore this same common issue across multiple product lines? Absolutely ridiculous. Would never even consider another JLab product again. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: No bass
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth works very well. They stay firmly in the ear while running. I just can’t get any bass out of them. I’ve changed the ear buds, cycled through the three different eq settings, changed eq in the apps I use and tried pressing them right in my ear canal, but the sound when running is very tini.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Was good, now one ear bud stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Received as a Christmas a present in 2019, I was really happy with these hesdphones. Slightly on the quieter side however I would exclusively use these for running. Great charge and the case allows 36 hours. In August the right earbud comepltely shut down and will not charge... rendering them useless. For £70 I expected longevity, disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Christie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Christmas present for somebody. We never did get the left earphone to work, even after following the factory instructions for linking the two headphones like 20 times. Fine if you’ve only got one ear. Disappointing for everyone else. Off to buy something of better quality. :’-(
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless

customer_reviews.title: Left ear bud stops working all the time...
customer_reviews.text: Left earned stops working all the time. I understand you can reset it, but it becomes extremely annoying having to do it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JPS

customer_reviews.title: Why pay more.
customer_reviews.text: Great for running, had them 9moths not a single issue.
customer_reviews.author: robin

product_meta.title: JLab Audio JBuds Air Sport True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds + Charging Case - Black - IP66 Sweat Resistance - Class 1 Bluetooth 5.0 Connection - 3 EQ Sound Settings JLab Signature, Balanced, Bass Boost
product_meta.description:
GO Move.

The JBuds Air Sport keep you GOing through any long, sweaty workout. The 6-hour battery life, plus an additional 34+ extra hours in the charging case, helps you power through. An IP66 sweat resistance holds up against even the toughest workouts. Plus, an ergonomic design with an over-ear hook and Cloud Foam eartips offer secure comfort for any activity. Turn on or off Be Aware Audio when you want to let ambient noise in for safe listening or pump up the bass with EQ3 Sound.

Long Playtime with Charging Case

Each earbud holds a 6-hour battery life and the case provides 34+ hours of extra work out time. JBuds Air Sport automatically charge when placed in the case, which recharges with the integrated patent-pending USB cable.

Sweatproof Sport Fit

An IP66 sweat resistance holds up against sweat and dirt, so hit the trails, the gym and more. The ergonomic earhook fits even the smallest ears and stay securely and comfortably in place. Switch the gel tips out for our included Cloud Foam tips and GO.

Auto On & Connect

JBuds Air Sport automatically turn on and connect to each other right out of the case. Then just connect to your phone. Utilizing Bluetooth 5, this is our fastest hands-free connection yet.

Stereo Audio Calling

The JBuds Air Sport feature stereo audio phone calls. You'll hear your friend in both earbuds clear conversations anywhere, anytime. Plus, touch sensors make it easy to control all your music and phone calls with just a tap or two on either earbud.

Be Aware Audio

Hear your surroundings while you run for safe listening with Be Aware Audio. Turn on when you want to let ambient noise in or off to zone out with just your music.

Custom EQ3 Sound

Choose the sound to match your personal preference between three options: JLab Signature, Balanced, and Bass Boost modes – without an app.
feature_bullets: Long Play-time with Charging Case: Each earbud holds a 6-hour battery life and the case provides 34+ hours of extra work out time. JBuds Air Sport automatically charge when placed in the case, which recharges with the integrated patent-pending USB cable.

Sweatproof Sport Fit: An IP66 sweat resistance holds up against sweat and dirt, so hit the trails, the gym and more. The ergonomic earhook fits even the smallest ears and stay securely and comfortably in place. Switch the gel tips out for our included Cloud Foam tips and GO.

Auto On & Connect: JBuds Air Sport automatically turn on and connect to each other right out of the case. Then just connect to your phone. Utilizing Bluetooth 5, this is our fastest hands-free connection yet.

Stereo Audio Calling: The JBuds Air Sport feature stereo audio phone calls. You'll hear your friend in both earbuds clear conversations anywhere, anytime. Plus, touch sensors make it easy to control all your music and phone calls with just a tap or two on either earbud.

Be Aware Audio and Custom EQ3 Sound: Hear your surroundings while you run for safe listening with Be Aware Audio. Turn on when you want to let ambient noise in or off to zone out with just your music. Choose the sound to match your personal preference between three options: JLab Signature, Balanced, and Bass Boost modes – without an app.
